title: "Flytxt CLTV AI for CX Now Available on SAP® Store As Part of SAP's Industry Cloud Portfolio"
excerpt: "Flytxt B.V. today announced that its Flytxt CLTV AI for CX solution is now available on SAP® Store and is part of SAP's industry cloud portfolio for the telecommunication industry. Flytxt CLTV AI leverages integration capabilities of SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) and integrates with SAP Customer Data Platform to deliver actionable customer and product intelligence to improve customer experience workflows and decisions,"
